
# imports
import sys
import StringIO
import re

class Problem(object):
    def __init__(self, reader):        
        self.reader = reader

    def run(self):                
        ptn_8 = re.compile(r"\b8\b")
        ptn_w8 = re.compile(r"\bw8\b")
        ptn_gr8 = re.compile(r"\bgr8\b")
        ptn_4= re.compile(r"\b4\b")
        ptn_b4= re.compile(r"\bb4\b")

        test_cases = int(self.reader.readline().strip())
        for test_case in xrange(test_cases):
            post = self.reader.readline().strip()
            # replace sms with full words
            post = ptn_8.sub("ate",  post)
            post = ptn_w8.sub("wait",  post)
            post = ptn_gr8.sub("great",  post)
            post = ptn_4.sub("for",  post)
            post = ptn_b4.sub("before",  post)

            print post
            

# Main entry point
############################################################ 
if __name__ == "__main__":

    data = sys.stdin

    problem = Problem(data)
    problem.run()
